item.title: MIUI OS3.0.40.0.WPCCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 17 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 17 China

Codename: pudding

Version: OS3.0.40.0.WPCCNXM | 16.0

Size: 11.1 GB

MD5: 2e87b0cc36eff3b40ec4967e43eaee2a

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved charging experience in certain situations
Optimization: Card swiping experience in some scenarios
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock experience
Fix: Incorrect color display in the Bluetooth device list
Fix: Occasional stuttering issues during casting
Fix: Occasional noise issues occurred when Immersive sound was turned on in certain scenarios

Download: Here
